front.title: IEEE Standard Guide for the Application, Operation, and Maintenance of Automatic Circuit Reclosers

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Information on the selection, application, operation, and maintenance of single-or multi-pole AC automatic circuit reclosers is provided. The principle characteristics of reclosers are identified, and the necessary system information is indicated. Step-by-step procedures for selecting reclosers for specific applications are given.
